trans-unit.source: Accessing XML in Visual Basic | Microsoft Docs
trans-unit.target: 在 Visual Basic 中访问 XML |Microsoft 文档

trans-unit.source: Accessing XML in Visual Basic
trans-unit.target: 在 Visual Basic 中访问 XML

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/vbprvb_md.md)] provides XML axis properties for accessing and navigating [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)] structures.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/vbprvb_md.md)]提供用于访问和导航 XML 轴属性[!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)]结构。

trans-unit.source: These properties use a special syntax to enable you to access elements and attributes by specifying the XML names.
trans-unit.target: 这些属性使用特殊语法来使您能够通过指定的 XML 名称来访问元素和属性。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the language features that enable you to access XML elements and attributes in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/vbprvb_md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 下表列出了可用于访问 XML 元素和属性中的语言功能[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/vbprvb_md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: XML Axis Properties
trans-unit.target: XML 轴属性

trans-unit.source: Property description
trans-unit.target: 属性说明

trans-unit.source: Example
trans-unit.target: 示例

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 说明

trans-unit.source: *child axis*
trans-unit.target: *子轴*

trans-unit.source: Gets all `phone` elements that are child elements of the `contact` element.
trans-unit.target: 获取所有`phone`元素属于的子元素`contact`元素。

trans-unit.source: *attribute axis*
trans-unit.target: *attribute 轴*

trans-unit.source: Gets all `type` attributes of the `phone` element.
trans-unit.target: 获取所有`type`属性`phone`元素。

trans-unit.source: *descendant axis*
trans-unit.target: *子代轴*

trans-unit.source: Gets all `name` elements of the `contacts` element, regardless of how deep in the hierarchy they occur.
trans-unit.target: 获取所有`name`元素`contacts`元素，而不考虑深度顺序层次结构中。

trans-unit.source: *extension indexer*
trans-unit.target: *扩展索引器*

trans-unit.source: Gets the first `name` element from the sequence.
trans-unit.target: 获取第一个`name`从序列的元素。

trans-unit.source: *value*
Gets the string representation of the first object in the sequence, or `Nothing` if the sequence is empty.
trans-unit.target: 获取在序列中，第一个对象的字符串表示或`Nothing`如果序列为空。

trans-unit.source: In This Section
trans-unit.target: 本节内容

trans-unit.source: [How to: Access XML Descendant Elements](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/xml/how-to-access-xml-descendant-elements.md)
trans-unit.target: [如何：访问 XML 子代元素](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/xml/how-to-access-xml-descendant-elements.md)

trans-unit.source: Shows how to use a descendant axis property to access all XML elements that have a specified name and that are contained under a specified XML element.
trans-unit.target: 演示如何使用子代轴属性来访问所有 XML 元素具有指定的名称并且包含在指定的 XML 元素之下。

trans-unit.source: [How to: Access XML Child Elements](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/xml/how-to-access-xml-child-elements.md)
trans-unit.target: [如何：访问 XML 子元素](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/xml/how-to-access-xml-child-elements.md)

trans-unit.source: Shows how to use a child axis property to access all XML child elements that have a specified name in an XML element.
trans-unit.target: 演示如何使用子轴属性来访问在一个 XML 元素具有指定的名称的所有 XML 子元素。

trans-unit.source: [How to: Access XML Attributes](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/xml/how-to-access-xml-attributes.md)
trans-unit.target: [如何：访问 XML 特性](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/xml/how-to-access-xml-attributes.md)

trans-unit.source: Shows how to use an attribute axis property to access all XML attributes that have a specified name in an XML element.
trans-unit.target: 演示如何使用特性轴属性来访问在一个 XML 元素具有指定的名称的所有 XML 特性。

trans-unit.source: [How to: Declare and Use XML Namespace Prefixes](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/xml/how-to-declare-and-use-xml-namespace-prefixes.md)
trans-unit.target: [如何：声明和使用 XML 命名空间前缀](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/xml/how-to-declare-and-use-xml-namespace-prefixes.md)

trans-unit.source: Shows how to declare an XML namespace prefix and use it to create and access XML elements.
trans-unit.target: 演示如何声明 XML 命名空间前缀，并使用它来创建和访问 XML 元素。
